Class Flag

java.lang.Object
com.game.models.entities.Flag
public class Flag extends Object
Represents a flag in Capture the Flag game mode. A flag has a fixed home position and can be picked up, carried, dropped, or returned.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Flag(int homeRow, int homeCol, int teamId)
    Constructs a Flag object with a specified home location and team.

  • Constructor Details

    • Flag

      public Flag(int homeRow, int homeCol, int teamId)
      Constructs a Flag object with a specified home location and team.
      Parameters:
      homeRow - The row where the flag's base is located.
      homeCol - The column where the flag's base is located.
      teamId - The ID of the team the flag belongs to (e.g., 0 or 1).

  • Method Details

    • getRow

      public int getRow()
      Gets the current row position of the flag.
      Returns:
      The row index.

    • getCol

      public int getCol()
      Gets the current column position of the flag.
      Returns:
      The column index.

    • getHomeRow

      public int getHomeRow()
      Gets the home row position of the flag.
      Returns:
      The flag's home row.

    • getHomeCol

      public int getHomeCol()
      Gets the home column position of the flag.
      Returns:
      The flag's home column.

    • isAtHome

      public boolean isAtHome()
      Checks if the flag is currently at its home position.
      Returns:
      true if the flag is at home; false otherwise.

    • isCarried

      public boolean isCarried()
      Checks if the flag is currently being carried by a player.
      Returns:
      true if the flag is carried; false otherwise.

    • getCarrier

      public Player getCarrier()
      Gets the player currently carrying the flag.
      Returns:
      The player carrying the flag, or null if not carried.

    • getTeamId

      public int getTeamId()
      Gets the team ID of the flag.
      Returns:
      The team ID (e.g., 0 or 1).

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(int row, int col)
      Updates the flag's position and its home status.
      Parameters:
      row - The new row position.
      col - The new column position.

    • pickUp

      public boolean pickUp(Player player)
      Attempts to pick up the flag with the specified player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player trying to pick up the flag.
      Returns:
      true if the flag was picked up; false if already carried.

    • drop

      public void drop(int row, int col)
      Drops the flag at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      row - The row where the flag is dropped.
      col - The column where the flag is dropped.

    • returnHome

      public void returnHome()
      Returns the flag to its home position, resetting its state.

    • updateCarrierPosition

      public void updateCarrierPosition()
      Updates the flag's position to match its carrier. Should be called after the carrier moves.

    • canBePickedUpBy

      public boolean canBePickedUpBy(Player player)
      Checks if a player can pick up this flag.
      Parameters:
      player - The player attempting pickup.
      Returns:
      true if pickup is possible (same position and not already carried).

    • isAtPosition

      public boolean isAtPosition(int row, int col)
      Checks if the flag is located at a specific position.
      Parameters:
      row - The row to check.
      col - The column to check.
      Returns:
      true if the flag is at the specified coordinates.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the flag's current state.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A formatted string describing the flag.
